response.answer_text: Here are a few I've relied on in the past, definitely recommend all of them, and the tweak bench suite is great for super synthy vgm stuff.  http://www.vstwarehouse.com/?m=1http://www.vst4free.com/http://bedroomproducersblog.com/free-vst-plugins/http://www.tweakbench.com/http://mda-vst.com/https://delamanchavst.wordpress.com/http://musicradar.com  Music radar usually links to quality shit. And they have a ton of free samples too.  Hope this helps some. Just keep your chin up and don't ever stop looking. Try everything that even sounds interesting. I recommend ignoring the ui, because there are some amazing vsts that have shitty, if not nonexistent UIs. Half the fun is exploring the sonic capabilities off each and everyone individually, seeing what you can accomplish.

The landscape of the music industry is readily changing & evolving at a rapid pace. This evolution has brought about positive changes that have completely altered the perception of the music production process. So, a modern recording studio does not have to have a massive ensemble of instrument collection or elaborate recording devices. In fact, the recording setup has become so much more streamlined and technology-driven due to the use of DAWs and VSTs. Therefore, in this article we round up the best VST instrument plugins available online. Whether you are a novice or a professional music producer, you need a well-performing laptop or PC; command over your preferred DAW; a bunch of VST plugins that cater to the unique demand of the track in production and a MIDI routing setup. Although, this is just the basic set up that you can build up or beef up as per your preference. One of the most elaborate components of this set up is the selection of VST plugin that the artists choose to add in his arsenal of production tools. The VST plugins are broadly categorized into VST effects, VST MIDI effects & VST instruments. VST instrument plugins are software that acts as an alternative to physical instruments. They generate audio as any synthesizer, sampler, or musical instrument (Guitar, brass, harp) would do for you. For the scope of this article, we will focus on the best VST instrument plugins only.
